attributes.action: The same speed limit for all vehicles.
attributes.additional_details: The speed limit for HGV's are 60mph on motorways, but reduced to 52mph & 56mph because of EU regs. duel carriageways are 50mph, and 40mph on single carriageways. the speed limits for most other vehicles are between 60mph & 70mph. So let's make it the same limit for trucks, cars, and motorcycles.
